short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro timer and countdown timer built into 1 place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension which allows users to set pomodoro timer to stay focused. It also comes with a timer, in which users can set either custom value or set of predefined values
